episodes_names: Episode 1 - Cleopatra Was Actually a Comedy Duo Known as Cleo and Patra!

Episode 8 - Seton Animal Chronicles Was Actually Donut Chronicles!
Episode 9 - Gagarin's Famous Quote Was, "The Earth Is ______"!
